1. zurgaa RGB unguudeer ylgaj harna (https://georgeom.net/StegOnline/image)
    Red -> 01100011 01100011 01110011 01000011 01010100 01000110 01111011
    Green -> 01111001 00110000 01110101 01110010 01011111 01100110 00110001
    Blue -> 00110100 01100111 01011111 01110011 00110001 01110010 01111101

2. binary -> ascii (https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/)

flag : ccsCTF{y0ur_f14g_s1r}
